jobs.title: Product Manager, Financial Services (Hybrid)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Hi, Future Homie!

At Homebase, you’ll join a team that’s bold, fast-moving, and obsessed with helping small businesses thrive. We build with empathy, act with urgency, and take big swings that drive real-world impact. Here, every Homie shows up to raise the bar, support one another, and celebrate wins as a team.

We’re not just building an app—we’re building unstoppable teams. So what do you say, are you in?


 📍Your Impact Starts Here

We’re looking for a Senior Product Manager to own and grow our Earned Wage Access (EWA) product, which already serves millions of hourly workers across the U.S.

This is a rare opportunity to help reshape financial access for hourly workers by scaling a product that millions already love while also building and growing a newer banking product. You’ll collaborate across design, engineering, compliance, data, and GTM teams to build financial products that are simple, trustworthy, and relied upon.

These are the key ways you’ll contribute and create impact in this role:

  • Own the end-to-end product strategy for our Earned Wage Access (EWA) product, including growth, retention, and monetization.

  • Run customer discovery and rapid experiments to identify pain points and validate product-market fit.

  • Optimize platform performance, UX, and reliability to deepen trust with millions of hourly workers.

  • Partner closely with Compliance and Risk to ensure financial products meet regulatory standards while remaining simple and transparent.

  • Leverage AI tools to accelerate discovery, prototyping, and roadmap execution.

  • Define and track success metrics tied to user adoption, engagement, and financial outcomes.

🚀 The Foundation for Success - These are the experiences and strengths that will set you up for success in this role:

  • 4+ years of product management experience in fintech, payments, or consumer financial services.

  • Proven success growing adoption of financial products at scale.

  • Strong understanding of financial regulations, compliance, and risk considerations.

  • Data-driven with experience in experimentation and growth optimization.

  • AI fluency: actively uses AI tools to prototype, test, and accelerate product development.

  • Comfortable with ambiguity and energized by solving complex financial problems for underserved communities.

  • Exceptional collaboration and communication skills across technical and non-technical stakeholders.

  • Able to work from a Homebase hub office 2+ days/week (Tues & Weds required).

🤝  The Homie Way - These principles guide everything we do—from how we work and make decisions to how we show up for each other.

  • 💡 Be Customer Obsessed – Solve problems with empathy and creativity.

  • ⚡ Move Fast, Learn Fast – Experiment, take action, and grow every day.

  • 🎯 Own Your Impact – Think big, focus on what matters, and make decisions you stand behind.

  • 🏆 Master Your Craft – Excellence fuels impact—show up, step up, and make your mark.

  • 🏅 Win Together – Put goals over roles, lead with trust, and connect to our mission and each other.

What We Offer (United States)  

  • 💰 Ownership & Financial Security: Stock options + 401(k) with 4% match

  • 🏥 Comprehensive Healthcare: Medical, dental, and vision coverage + FSA options

  • ⏰ Flexible Time: Unlimited PTO (salaried) + company holidays

  • 👶 Family Support: Up to 12 weeks of paid parental leave (after 6 months of service)

  • 🛡️ Protection Plans: Life insurance + short/long-term disability coverage

  • 🌟 Work Your Way: Work From Anywhere Month + meeting-free weeks yearly

  • 🍽️ Workspace Perks: Meals provided, commuter benefits, team offsites, and Customer Days

  • 💼 Our Hybrid Rhythm: We believe collaboration drives impact. That’s why Tuesday and Wednesday are our required in-office days—a time to move faster as a team, build deeper connections, make better decisions, and build together.

What We Offer (Canada)

  • 💰 Ownership & Savings: Stock options + TFSA/RRSP with 4% company match

  • 🏥 Health & Wellness: Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision for you and your dependents

  • ⏰ Time Flexibility: Flex time off + company holidays + designated focus periods

  • 👨‍💻 Ideal Setup: 3 days WFH (Mon/Thu/Fri), 2 collaborative office days (Tue/Wed)

  • 👶 Family Support: Maternity/Parental Leave EI top-up support offered (after 6 months of service)

  • 🌟 Work Your Way: Work From Anywhere Month + meeting-free weeks yearly

  • 🛡️ Protection Plans: Life insurance + short/long-term disability coverage

  • 🍽️ Workspace Perks: Meals provided, team offsites, and Customer Days

What to Expect During the Interview Process

  • Meet the Talent Acquisition team, Mavel W. & Phollie Rose L.

  • Meet the Hiring Manager, Jon B.

  • Participate in a Talent Showcase

  • Meet Cross-functional Partners

  • Background Check + Offer Stage

  • Welcome to the team, Homie 🎉

💜 Belonging at Homebase - We're committed to fostering a welcoming space where every Homie can be their full self. Experience comes in many forms—so if you're excited about this role, even if you don’t meet 100% of the qualifications, we encourage you to apply! 

Homebase will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

👋 Hey, We’re Homebase

Unstoppable teams start here.

Homebase is the everything app for hourly teams—built to simplify the day-to-day and superpower local businesses. With tools for scheduling, time clocks, payroll, communication, HR, and more, we help teams stay connected and in control. Today, over 100,000 small (but mighty) businesses rely on us to make work radically easier. Together, we’ve tracked over a billion hours for 2.5+ million workers—and we’re just getting started.

At Homebase, we celebrate diversity and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We welcome all candidates and do not discriminate based on any legally protected status. If you need accommodations during the hiring process, please let us know—we’re committed to ensuring fair and equitable access for all.

jobs.title: Account Executive I (Hybrid)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Hi, Future Homie!

At Homebase, you’ll join a team that’s bold, fast-moving, and obsessed with helping small businesses thrive. We build with empathy, act with urgency, and take big swings that drive real-world impact. Here, every Homie shows up to raise the bar, support one another, and celebrate wins as a team.

We’re not just building an app—we’re building unstoppable teams. So what do you say, are you in?


 📍Your Impact Starts Here

We are seeking an Account Executive who is passionate about empowering small businesses. In this role, you will contribute more than just making sales; you'll be an integral part of a collaborative team, thriving on both team-based and individual performance targets. Accelerate your career in SaaS sales by helping small businesses succeed with our tailored solutions. If you are driven to deliver value to SMBs, we would love to connect with you.

  • Team-Based Sales Cycle Management: Collaborate with your team members to handle various stages of the sales process, ensuring a cohesive flow and collective accountability towards both individual and team quotas.

  • Revenue Contribution: Meet and strive to exceed both individual and team sales targets through diligent follow-up, unrivalled customer engagements, and effective utilization of sales tools.

  • Consultative Selling: Employ our proven Homebase Sales Methodology to conduct thorough sales discussions, pinpoint customer needs, and recommend tailored solutions to enhance operational efficiency.

  • Process Adherence: Diligently follow prescriptive sales processes designed to reach customers with the right message at the right time, ensuring consistency and effectiveness in sales operations.

  • High-Volume Customer Interaction: Maintain robust engagement with clients and prospects through frequent phone calls and emails, actively listening and responding to their needs.

  • AI-Enabled Selling: Experiment with AI tools to optimize prospecting, outreach, and workflow efficiency, sharing insights with your team to continuously improve the sales process.

🚀 The Foundation for Success - These are the experiences and strengths that will set you up for success in this role:

  • 2+ years of selling experience, with a keen interest in growing in SaaS Sales.

  • Eager to advance through learning and adapting, you thrive on constructive feedback and are committed to continuous self-improvement.

  • Curious and comfortable using AI tools to improve your sales approach; eager to measure impact and adapt workflows

  • Ready to share success and accountability, you understand the importance of collective efforts in achieving team goals, but you don’t hide behind others' success

  • Excel in building rapport and fostering relationships through inquisitive and impactful communication, consistently seeking to understand the deeper needs and motivations of clients and prospects.

  • Approach challenges with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset.

  • Act like an owner — every Homie receives stock options and is expected to make decisions that drive long-term value for our customers and company.

🤝  The Homie Way - These principles guide everything we do—from how we work and make decisions to how we show up for each other.

  • 💡 Be Customer Obsessed – Solve problems with empathy and creativity.

  • ⚡ Move Fast, Learn Fast – Experiment, take action, and grow every day.

  • 🎯 Own Your Impact – Think big, focus on what matters, and make decisions you stand behind.

  • 🏆 Master Your Craft – Excellence fuels impact—show up, step up, and make your mark.

  • 🏅 Win Together – Put goals over roles, lead with trust, and connect to our mission and each other.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Ownership & Financial Security: Stock options + 401(k) with 4% match

  • 🏥 Comprehensive Healthcare: Medical, dental, and vision coverage + FSA options

  • ⏰ Flexible Time: 20 days PTO (hourly) + company holidays

  • 👶 Family Support: Up to 12 weeks of paid parental leave (after 6 months of service)

  • 🛡️ Protection Plans: Life insurance + short/long-term disability coverage

  • 🌟 Work Your Way: Work From Anywhere Month + meeting-free weeks yearly

  • 🍽️ Workspace Perks: Meals provided, commuter benefits, team offsites, and Customer Days

  • 💼 Our Hybrid Rhythm: We believe collaboration drives impact. That’s why Monday-Thursday are our required in-office days—a time to move faster as a team, build deeper connections, make better decisions, and build together.

What to Expect During the Interview Process

  • Meet the Talent Acquisition team, Phollie Rose L.

  • Meet the Hiring Manager, Kristen G.

  • Participate in a Talent Showcase

  • Meet Cross-functional Partners

  • Background Check + Offer Stage

  • Welcome to the team, Homie 🎉

💜 Belonging at Homebase - We're committed to fostering a welcoming space where every Homie can be their full self. Experience comes in many forms—so if you're excited about this role, even if you don’t meet 100% of the qualifications, we encourage you to apply! 

Homebase will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

👋 Hey, We’re Homebase

Unstoppable teams start here.

Homebase is the everything app for hourly teams—built to simplify the day-to-day and superpower local businesses. With tools for scheduling, time clocks, payroll, communication, HR, and more, we help teams stay connected and in control. Today, over 100,000 small (but mighty) businesses rely on us to make work radically easier. Together, we’ve tracked over a billion hours for 2.5+ million workers—and we’re just getting started.

At Homebase, we celebrate diversity and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We welcome all candidates and do not discriminate based on any legally protected status. If you need accommodations during the hiring process, please let us know—we’re committed to ensuring fair and equitable access for all.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer, Platform & Mobile Messaging (Hybrid)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Hi, Future Homie!

At Homebase, you’ll join a team that’s bold, fast-moving, and obsessed with helping small businesses thrive. We build with empathy, act with urgency, and take big swings that drive real-world impact. Here, every Homie shows up to raise the bar, support one another, and celebrate wins as a team.

We’re not just building an app—we’re building unstoppable teams. So what do you say, are you in?

📍Your Impact Starts Here

As a Senior Product Designer, you will lead the design of experiences across our platform and mobile messaging products. This role requires a deep understanding of how cohesive platform solutions and strategic messaging frameworks drive both business success and customer satisfaction across web and native mobile experiences. Your work will directly influence how other teams integrate and leverage these platforms to enhance overall functionality and user experience.

These are the key ways you’ll contribute and create impact in this role:

  • Lead Platform and Messaging Design: Direct the user interface and functional design of our web and native mobile platform and messaging products, ensuring seamless integration and strategic alignment across different teams.

  • Develop Strategies and Frameworks: Create robust strategies and design frameworks that serve as a blueprint for other teams to build upon and connect with, facilitating consistency and scalability.

  • Innovate in Ambiguity: Lead in ambiguous scenarios, pushing boundaries with a highly motivated attitude and clear vision.

  • Expertise in UI/UX: Craft impactful user interfaces grounded in strong UX foundations to create experiences that ensure the user is able to accomplish their tasks.

  • AI and Technological Integration: Employ AI tools effectively, improving design methodologies and showcasing advanced examples and demonstrations.

  • Move Fast: At Homebase, speed is our competitive edge. We prioritize what matters most, act decisively, and adapt quickly.

🚀 The Foundation for Success - These are the experiences and strengths that will set you up for success in this role:

  • Seasoned Leadership: Demonstrated leadership capabilities, with a track record of inspiring teams and peers, and driving complex projects to success.

  • Recent native mobile experience: while you won’t be limited to native experiences, recent experience (within the last 3 years) is a significant and critical part of this role.

  • Master of UI/UX: Exceptional skills in both User Interface and User Experience design, clearly demonstrated through a distinguished portfolio.

  • Strategic Thinker: Adept at understanding and implementing large-scale business implications of design decisions within the tech landscape.

  • AI Proficiency: Extensive experience with AI tools in design, enhancing both process and product quality.

  • Proven experience in platform and messaging product design.

  • Up-to-date with the latest industry trends and AI technologies.

🤝  The Homie Way - These principles guide everything we do—from how we work and make decisions to how we show up for each other.

  • 💡 Be Customer Obsessed – Solve problems with empathy and creativity.

  • ⚡ Move Fast, Learn Fast – Experiment, take action, and grow every day.

  • 🎯 Own Your Impact – Think big, focus on what matters, and make decisions you stand behind.

  • 🏆 Master Your Craft – Excellence fuels impact—show up, step up, and make your mark.

  • 🏅 Win Together – Put goals over roles, lead with trust, and connect to our mission and each other.

What We Offer

  • 💰 Ownership & Financial Security: Stock options + 401(k) with 4% match

  • 🏥 Comprehensive Healthcare: Medical, dental, and vision coverage + FSA options

  • ⏰ Flexible Time: Unlimited PTO (salaried) + company holidays

  • 👶 Family Support: Up to 12 weeks of paid parental leave (after 6 months of service)

  • 🛡️ Protection Plans: Life insurance + short/long-term disability coverage

  • 🌟 Work Your Way: Work From Anywhere Month + meeting-free weeks yearly

  • 🍽️ Workspace Perks: Meals provided, commuter benefits, team offsites, and Customer Days

  • 💼 Our Hybrid Rhythm: We believe collaboration drives impact. That’s why Tuesday and Wednesday are our required in-office days—a time to move faster as a team, build deeper connections, make better decisions, and build together.

What to Expect During the Interview Process

  • Meet the Talent Acquisition team. Phollie Rose L.

  • Meet the Hiring Manager, Christan F.

  • Participate in a Talent Showcase

  • Meet Cross-functional Partners

  • Background Check + Offer Stage

  • Welcome to the team, Homie 🎉

💜 Belonging at Homebase - We're committed to fostering a welcoming space where every Homie can be their full self. Experience comes in many forms—so if you're excited about this role, even if you don’t meet 100% of the qualifications, we encourage you to apply! 

Homebase will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance.

👋 Hey, We’re Homebase

With tools for scheduling, time clocks, payroll, communication, HR, and more, we help teams stay connected and in control.
